verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
it's that precious, priceless, powerful, praising
Wonderful life in me
I can climb any mountain
I can walk on top of the sea
I can cast down any stronghold
That this world might have on me
By that precious, priceless, powerful, praising
Wonderful life in me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In the morning when I arise
And get on my knees to pray
It should come as no surprise
The devil's got something to say
Words of doubt and words of fear he tries to get to me
But in the name of Jesus I tear his lies to pieces
And the devil just has to flee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now that old devil he won't quit trying
To keep me from the light
Walking about like a roaring lion trying to take a bite
Still the Lord gives me the victory
So I praise Him more and more
As I keep on abiding He'll keep on guiding
And there's victory in store.
